required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: First-in-Human Single and Multiple Dose of GLPG1690
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Dose-escalation Study for the Assessment of Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Single and Multiple Ascending Oral Doses of GLPG1690 in Healthy Male Subjects

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this First-in-Human study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability after single ascending oral doses of GLPG1690 given to healthy male subjects, compared to placebo. Also, the safety and tolerability of multiple ascending oral doses of GLPG1690 given to healthy male subjects daily for 14 days compared to placebo, will be evaluated.
Furthermore, during the course of the study after single and multiple oral dose administrations, the amount of GLPG1690 present in the blood and urine (pharmacokinetics) as well as the reduction of biomarker levels by GLPG1690 in plasma samples (pharmacodynamics) will be characterized compared to placebo.
The pharmacokinetics of a solid dosage formulation of GLPG1690 will be compared with those of a liquid dosage formulation of GLPG1690.
Also, the potential of cytochrome P450 (CYP)3A4 induction after repeated dosing with GLPG1690 will be explored.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: Between screening and 7-10 days after the last dose
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of GLPG1690 in comparison with placebo after a single and multiple oral dose in healthy subjects in terms of adverse events

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal laboratory parameters
primary_outcome.time_frame: Between screening and 7-10 days after the last dose
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of GLPG1690 in comparison with placebo after single and multiple oral dose in healthy subjects in terms of abnormal laboratory parameters

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal vital signs
primary_outcome.time_frame: Between screening and 7-10 days after the last dose
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of GLPG1690 in comparison with placebo after a single and multiple oral dose in healthy subjects in terms of abnormal vital signs

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal electrocardiogram
primary_outcome.time_frame: Between screening and 7-10 days after the last dose
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of GLPG1690 in comparison with placebo after a single and multiple oral dose in healthy subjects in terms of abnormal electrocardiogram

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with abnormal physical examination
primary_outcome.time_frame: Between screening and 7-10 days after the last dose
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of GLPG1690 in comparison with placebo after a single and multiple oral dose in healthy subjects in terms of abnormal physical examination

secondary_outcome.measure: The amount of GLPG1690 in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Between Day 1 predose and 48 hours after the (last) dose
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the amount of GLPG1690 in plasma over time - pharmacokinetics (PK) - after a single and multiple oral dose in healthy subjects, either as liquid or solid formulation

secondary_outcome.measure: The amount of GLPG1690 in urine
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Between Day 1 predose and 24 hours after the (last) dose
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the amount of GLPG1690 in urine over time - pharmacokinetics (PK) - after a single and multiple oral dose in healthy subjects, either as liquid or solid formulation

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Twelve hours before dosing on Day 1 and Day 14
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the potential of CYP3A4 induction after repeated dosing with GLPG1690 by means of the ratio of 6-b-hydroxycortisol/cortisol in urine

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 predose up to 48 hours post (last) dose
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacodynamics (PD) of GLPG1690 by means of reduction of levels of biomarker by GLPG1690 compared to placebo in plasma after single and multiple oral dose in healthy subjects

arm_group.description: Single oral dose of GLPG1690 suspension or solid formulation - ascending doses
Single oral dose of placebo suspension or solid formulation
Multiple oral doses of GLPG1690 suspension - ascending doses
Multiple oral doses of placebo suspension

intervention.description: Single dose, oral suspension or solid formulation, starting dose of 20mg escalating up to 1500mg
Single dose, oral suspension or solid formulation matching placebo

intervention.intervention_name: GLPG1690, multiple ascending doses, oral suspension
intervention.description: Multiple doses, daily for 14 days, oral suspension, anticipated doses: 300mg to 1000mg

intervention.intervention_name: Placebo, multiple ascending doses, oral suspension
intervention.description: Multiple doses, daily for 14 days, oral suspension matching placebo

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy male, age 18-50 years
- BMI between 18-30 kg/m2
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any condition that might interfere with the procedures or tests in this study
- Drug or alcohol abuse
- Smoking

facility.name: SGS LSS Clinical Pharmacology Unit Antwerp
